remarks: The lattice of Hilbert subspaces is atomistic, i.e. any element is the supremum of its atoms.  Part of proof of Theorem 16.9 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 70.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
